TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Header/ItemRight extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Header::ItemRight abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the rightmost item of the header control. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight>类获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>最右边的标头项的不同状态。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight.Normal%2A>属性。 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementHeaderItemRight1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#172](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#172)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#172](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#172)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Hot As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the rightmost header item in the hot state.
Docs.value: A ，表示在热状态的最右边的标头项。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight.Hot%2A>属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight.Hot%2A>属性。 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementHeaderItemRight2`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#173](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#173)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#173](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#173)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Normal As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the rightmost header item in the normal state.
Docs.value: A ，表示处于正常状态的最右边的标头项。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight.Normal%2A>属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Pressed As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the rightmost header item in the pressed state.
Docs.value: A ，表示在按下状态的最右边的标头项。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight.Pressed%2A>属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
